message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. We believe it could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, we're offering it to you at an introductory price of $15000. This is a limited-time offer, so please let us know if you're interested.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of similar products.
